name: Black Pirate's Pub
text:
The Galley - Late Night Pub Grub
Pulled Pork Sandwich - $11

On Kaiser with coleslaw, pickle.

Three Taco Combo - $14

Chicken or pork with all the fixin's.

Oven Baked Nachos - $14

With bacon, olives, peppers, jalapeno.

Add chicken or pork for $5.

Add extra cheese for $5.

ALL ITEMS TAX INCLUDED
